comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Gabriel Astruc, journalist and theatre impresario, founded the Theatre des Champs Elysees, where the first performance of Stravinsky's "The Rite of Spring" was staged in 1913. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Th%c3%a9%c3%a2tre_des_Champs-%c3%89... His papers are in the New York Public Library.
